author: linzi94

comment:
Ok, I want Amber Heard thrown in a jail as much as the next soul, but this analysis needs to be taken with a bag of salt. I don't believe her spiel about the situation for one moment, and I get some of what's been pointed out, but there's a a few things being said that are fartfetched and pure speculation.

For example, the 'drawn over' argument doesn't sit well with me, because typically most mirrors will give a 'double' reflection at certain angles, and the drawn over is waaaaaay too perfectly parallelled with the original lines to have been done by anybody. The fact that parts of the word look 'fatter' than others has to do with the effect of perspective.

The 'Simom' thing is pure speculation, you can't guess a person's mind; the most plausible argument is that she was either drunk and out of it, or she just simply mistyped.

Trying to guess what a person would or wouldn't do in a traumatic situation is a fruitless exercise. Everyone reacts to trauma differently. Johnny drew on mirrors and furniture in his shock, when maybe someone else would've just lied down catatotnic, or screamed, or ran. So the same logic can be applied to AH. Be careful with the double standards, regardless of what a piece of shit she is.

The lipstick thing has to be taken down to caligraphy analysis - this is the only thing that will make me go 'a-ha!'. Aside from that, there's no reason to think he wouldn't grab one of her lipsticks and use it on the mirror. He could've washed his hands after, or thrown the dirty rags in a bin. Speculation.

I'm not trying to rain on anyone's parade... I'm just reminding people that as much as we want to jump onto 'proof', we HAVE to keep a clear head and question everything, so we can sift through the speculation and just rely on absolute fact. It doesn't surprise me that Depp's team didn't use Andy's analysis.

author: Van A. Johnson

comment: Great video as always and thank you for trying to get the word out. I have been around since the first accusation. I think the barricading in a room is the wrong thing to call out. My reasons is real victims have done this. Johnny for example would hide in a bathroom from her. I have noticed an increase in comments from people saying things such as "no abuse victim would do that" or similar comments. It's a very slippery slope and one that has some supporters essentially calling abuse victims who fall into these scenarios liars. I looked at this whole case objectively and also from the view as a victim. While something may not ring true to me I would not make a statement that may call others names or liars as some have. For me it was the video she released. An abuse victim would fear the abuser as they were slamming things around and getting angry. Since she stated she feared her life etc that video was a pivotal moment I saw through her as much as what she has described such as barricading or hiding in rooms etc are all things abuse victims may have done at some point. Johnny admitted what he wrote on that mirror knowing he would look bad to some out there. I don't know why he would lie about 1 thing. I believe she wrote it of course.

comment:
Look I‚Äôm speaking from experience with SA and DV. And V.SA. Ok. Let me tell everyone right now. AFTER SA you do NOT put a bikini on and go swimming or sitting in a pool. Ok. Period. Full stop. You are so banged up and stiffness sets in and the pain and humiliation and PAIN sets in. You don‚Äôt take a small break in a bathroom then decide to put a bikini on and go out from the safety of your locked bathroom to go gets some sun. You hide. You hide your body and all your injuries. Your injuries prevent you from putting all the sore spots soaking in water??? No way. Too painful. You don‚Äôt go sit in a pool soaking in water with sore SA areas. Specially if it‚Äôs the next day. My god people the full pain and damage of the V DV and SA VSA will be really swelling and showing as well as the stiffness from the struggle will be fully stopping you from doing anything put crying in a ball on the floor in a corner. Not putting a bikini on swimming and resuming life as usual.  No way. This is completely insane. ONLY A PERSON WHO HAS NEVER BEEN SA OR DV WOULD EVER THINK THIS WAS POSSIBLE. Absolutely disgusting. Who makes this horrific nonsense up. 
This type of stuff happeneds to women everyday and it‚Äôs disgusting and needs to stop AH making light of these serious crimes is completely horrible and inexcusable. She‚Äôs making it look like a woman who had suffered this type of crimes isn‚Äôt really affected at all. It‚Äôs just not true. And one SA or DV will leave you with life long permanent body harm. I still years later can‚Äôt even run my own hands on the back of my arms due to the extreme pain from the skin being so damaged in DV. My arms were held so hard to hold me still that I have permanent damage to my arms that you cannot see now years later but the damage is there under the skin. Not even a light touch of those areas that were squeezed so hard is tolerable. My knees buckle in pain instantly if even my gf touches my arm to say hi. That‚Äôs how permanent injuries from DV and SA are. It NO JOKE. She makes me sick.
